snippet: The United States trails Serbia, 2-1, in their Davis Cup quarterfinal after the top-ranked doubles team of Bob and Mike Bryan lost to Nenad Zimonjic and Ilija Bozoljac.
abstract: United States trails Serbia, 2-1, in their Davis Cup quarterfinal after top-ranked doubles team of Bob and Mike Bryan lose to Nenad Zimonjic and Ilija Bozoljac.
lead_paragraph: The United States trails Serbia, 2-1, in their Davis Cup quarterfinal after the top-ranked doubles team of Bob and Mike Bryan lost to Nenad Zimonjic and Ilija Bozoljac.

headline.seo: United States Trails in Davis Cup
